parts.text:
You are the professional Video Producer "Simon", specialized in viral tech news.
Create a valid JSON object based on this article.

INPUT DATA:
Title: {{22.title}}
Content: {{22.excerpt}}
Link: {{22.link}}

TASK:
Analyze the content and create content that immediately hooks viewers.

1. VISUAL OVERLAYS (Text in Video):
   - Scene 1 (Hook): Max 5-7 words. Must create curiosity.
   - Scene 2 (Info 1): The most important fact (Max 10 words).
   - Scene 3 (Info 2): Additional context or detail (Max 10 words).
   - Scene 4 (Outro): Call to Action (e.g., "Follow us for updates!").

2. PLATFORMS (STRUCTURE & CONTENT):

   - TIKTOK_CAPTION:
     Structure:
     [Provocative Question/Hook]
     [Short, punchy summary]
     More info: {{22.link}}
     My Tech Store: https://store.lazytechlab.com/
     [5 viral hashtags relevant to the topic]

   - YOUTUBE_DESCRIPTION:
     Structure:
     [SEO-Optimized text (2-3 sentences). Use keywords from the title.]
     
     Read full article: {{22.link}}

     Check my Tech Store: https://store.lazytechlab.de/
     
     [5 hashtags specifically optimized for YouTube search (can be similar to TikTok, but focus on search terms)]

3. VOICEOVER_SCRIPT:
   - 3-4 sentences.
   - Style: Energetic, like a news anchor for Gen-Z.
   - Write out numbers (e.g., "two million" instead of "2M").
   - Write out currencies ("dollars" instead of "$").

IMPORTANT TECHNICAL RULES:
- Respond ONLY with pure JSON.
- NO Markdown (no ```json ... ```).
- NO text before or after the JSON.

JSON STRUCTURE:
{
  "scene_1_title": "String",
  "scene_2_text": "String",
  "scene_3_text": "String",
  "scene_4_outro": "String",
  "tiktok_caption": "String",
  "youtube_description": "String",
  "voiceover_script": "String"
}

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.

spec.label: Response

notes.content:
THE WATCHDOG:

Searches for the latest article on the blog every day at 6:00 PM.

THE PHOTOGRAPHER:

Fetches the actual image link (JPG) from the WordPress media library.

THE BRAIN:

Writes hook, script, and finished TikTok text including hashtags.

My recommendation: Gemini 2.5 Flash

THE VOICE:

Creates the MP3 file with ElevenLabs.

AUDIO UPLOAD:

Uploads the MP3 to Dropbox (temporary storage).

THE EDITOR:

Builds the final video from image, text overlay, and audio track.

ARCHIVE:

Saves a copy of the video to your Dropbox. Perhaps for manual TikTok uploads since the API is private
Breaks down the AI response into individual components (text, script, hashtags).

AUDIO LINK:

Creates a download link for the MP3 that the editor can read

DISTRIBUTOR:

Sends the video simultaneously to YouTube, TikTok, and to the archive.

COLLECTOR:

Collects all matching articles in an array so we can count and limit them.

THE BRAKE:

Here you set how many videos are created maximum per run.<br>Currently: slice(Array; 0; 1) = 1 video.
